High School filled me with warm goodness.

[spoiler]Well some of the football team did at least[/spoiler][/bq]

my high school was filled either with asshole dudebros, passive aggresive class clowns, or just straight up bitchy people.

i learned that if i wanted to survive i had to become one of them.

so i became that dude that doesnt talk to anybody and its incredibly sarcastic to the point you are forced to leave him alone.

and that might shoot up the school one day
